title: RADS Error, Help!
body: I recently got an error called a "RADS Error". I have tried multiple solutions, like changing the Protocol 4 DNS address to 8888/8844, adding Riot to my hosts in windows/system 32/drivers/etc, launching game as admin, checking my firewall, none have worked. This really sucks and am looking for a solution...

replies.body:
RADS errors are typically a good sign that your OS doesn't have the right permissions in place to allow League to launch. Basically, your OS needs to decide whether a program is alright or not, and if it doesn't have permissions set up it will outright shut down that program.

Run through our [**Permission Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get those settings in place. Hit me back up if you have any questions!

Update: It was on my internet providers end, some things had to get cleared up and updated and everything is back to normal. Strange as it is, things like that can cause the RADS error too. Thanks for the reply!!
